00001 #ifndef MAGEPHEMINFO_H
00002 #define MAGEPHEMINFO_H
00003 
00004 #include <Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h>
00005 #include <Lgm/Lgm_LstarInfo.h>
00006 
00007 #define MAX_PITCH_ANGLES 900
00008 
00009 
00010 /*
00011  * Structure to hold all relevant magnetic ephemeris quantities.  I.e.,
00012  * everything from physical location of S/C to magnetic coordinates adiabatic
00013  * invariants etc...
00014  */
00015 typedef struct Lgm_MagEphemInfo {
00016 
00017     Lgm_LstarInfo   *LstarInfo;
00018     int             LstarQuality;
00019     int             SaveShellLines;
00020     
00021     long int    Date;
00022     double      UTC;
00023     double      Lat;
00024     double      Lon;
00025     double      Rad;
00026 
00027     Lgm_Vector  P_gsm;      // S/C position in GSM
00028     double      B;          // Local B-field magnitude (i.e. at S/C position)
00029 
00030     Lgm_Vector  Pmin_gsm;   // position of minimum |B| in GSM
00031     double      Bmin;       // Value of |Bmin|
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 
00036     int         UseInterpRoutines;
00037 
00038     /*
00039      * Array of PAs we need to compute things for...
00040      */
00041     int         nAlpha;         // Number of PAs
00042     double      Alpha[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];      // Pitch Angles (Degrees)
00043     Lgm_Vector  Pmn_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];    // position of northern |Bmirror|
00044     Lgm_Vector  Pms_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];    // position of southern |Bmirror|
00045     double      Bm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];         // Value of |Bm| (i.e. Bmirror)
00046     double      I[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00047     double      Sb[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00048     double      Tb[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];         // we calculate this for a 1Mev electron but could do more...
00049     double      K[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00050 
00051     int         nShellPoints[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];               // # of point (i.e. FLs) in a shell calculation)
00052     Lgm_Vector  ShellFootprint_Pn[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];    // north footprints of shell lines
00053     Lgm_Vector  ShellFootprint_Ps[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];    // south footprints of shell lines
00054     Lgm_Vector  ShellMirror_Pn[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];       // north mirror locations
00055     Lgm_Vector  ShellMirror_Ps[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];       // south mirror locations
00056     double      ShellMirror_Sn[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];       // north mirror locations (dist along FL)
00057     double      ShellMirror_Ss[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];       // south mirror locations (dist along FL)
00058     double      ShellI[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][100];               // Individual I values computed for each FL
00059 
00060     /*
00061      * these are like the variables in the LstarInfo structure. Except they have an extra
00062      * dimension to hold pitch angle as well.
00063      */
00064     int         nFieldPnts[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48];     
00065     double      s_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48][1000];
00066     double      Bmag[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48][1000];
00067     double      x_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48][1000];
00068     double      y_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48][1000];
00069     double      z_gsm[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES][48][1000];
00070 
00071     double      Mcurr;
00072     double      Mref;
00073     double      Mused;
00074     double      LHilton[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00075     double      LMcIlwain[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00076     double      Lstar[MAX_PITCH_ANGLES];
00077 
00078 
00079 } Lgm_MagEphemInfo;

00086 double  j_to_fp_2( double j, double Ek0, double Ek1 );

00093 void Lgm_FreeMagEphemInfo( Lgm_MagEphemInfo  *Info );
